holidays.title: Batman Day
holidays.description: Billionaire Bruce Wayne by day, crime-fighting caped crusader Batman by night.

holidays.title: International Patient Safety Day
holidays.description: Complex, multi-layered health care systems can sometime stray from patient safety considerations.

holidays.title: National Cleanup Day
holidays.description: After all, being a good citizen includes keeping our communities clean!

holidays.title: National Dance Day
holidays.description: We brought the music, you bring the moves!

holidays.title: National Pet Bird Day
holidays.description: Preen your feathers and warm up your singing voice!

holidays.title: Abergavenny Food Festival
holidays.description: Don’t even think about missing this food festival if you are in the U.K.

holidays.title: Australian Citizenship Day
holidays.description: Whether Australian by birth or choice, take the pledge on Australian Citizenship Day.

holidays.title: Constitution Day
holidays.description: One of the world’s most important documents that makes America the great nation it is today.

holidays.title: International Coastal Cleanup Day
holidays.description: Let’s roll up our sleeves and clean our beaches and coastlines to reduce pollution.

holidays.title: INTERNATIONAL COUNTRY MUSIC DAY
holidays.description: On International Country Music Day, dip into the wellspring and take a sip.

holidays.title: International Eat An Apple Day
holidays.description: As the saying goes, that's how you keep the doctor away.

holidays.title: International Grenache Day
holidays.description: Enjoy some Grenache as we take you on the grape’s journey through the years.

holidays.title: National AKC Responsible Dog Ownership Day
holidays.description: Hey, dog owners, kiss your buddies and give them extra special treats today!

holidays.title: National Apple Dumpling Day
holidays.description: Get your apples and your fillings ready, we are making America's favorite pastry!

holidays.title: National Arielle K. Sterrett Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the significance of the day set aside to promote acts of kindness.

holidays.title: National Bobby Day
holidays.description: Let’s make today a day to remember for all the Bobbys we love.

holidays.title: National Boys’ and Girls’ Club Day for Kids
holidays.description: National Boys’ and Girls’ Club Day for Kids is here, let’s celebrate!

holidays.title: National Gymnastics Day
holidays.description: Gyms turn into beehives of activity, highlighting the benefits of a healthy body.

holidays.title: National Monte Cristo Day
holidays.description: Monte Cristo melts hearts and then melts in your mouth.

holidays.title: National Pet Carbon Monoxide (CO) Safety Day
holidays.description: Learn all the right steps you need to keep your pets safe from carbon monoxide poisoning.

holidays.title: National Professional House Cleaners Day
holidays.description: How often do you show appreciation for the pleasant smell of a clean home?

holidays.title: National Sew a Jelly Roll Day
holidays.description: Warm those Jelly Rolls up; it’s time for National Sew a Jelly Roll Day!

holidays.title: National Table Shuffleboard Day
holidays.description: Next time you pop into the bar, make a beeline for the shuffleboard.

holidays.title: Puppy Mill Awareness Day
holidays.description: Did you know millions of dogs are killed due to puppy mills every day?

holidays.title: Responsible Dog Ownership Day
holidays.description: Today, pet parents ‘pawse’ and remember the promises they made to their ‘furever’ friends.

holidays.title: Smithsonian Day
holidays.description: Smithsonian Day celebrates the Smithsonian Institution and its vast contribution to the culture.

holidays.title: Time's Up Day
holidays.description: You are out of time! Get your glue ready, we are mending broken relationships!

holidays.title: Usher Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: The first step to raising awareness for this rare genetic disease is educating yourself.

holidays.title: World Patient Safety Day
holidays.description: Join us as we honor patient safety as a priority in healthcare systems across the world.

holidays.title: Alfie Deyes’s Birthday
holidays.description: A YouTuber who is also a writer and businessman? Deyes has done it all.

holidays.title: Bobby Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: His story will give you valuable life lessons — remember to take notes.

holidays.title: GZBkarma’s Birthday
holidays.description: GZBkarma’s giddy enjoyment of everything K-pop echoes our own! We can’t wait for more content!

holidays.title: Jonathan McReynolds’s Birthday
holidays.description: Strong in his faith, McReynolds knew God would use his musical talent in a great way!

holidays.title: Mia Talerico’s Birthday
holidays.description: She has accomplished more as a kid than most achieve in their lifetime!
